data.name: Absolute Grace
data.oracle_text: All creatures have protection from black.
data.flavor_text: In pursuit of Urza, the Phyrexians sent countless foul legions into Serra's realm. Though beaten back, they left it tainted with uncleansable evil.

data.name: Absolute Law
data.oracle_text: All creatures have protection from red.
data.flavor_text: The strength of law is unwavering. It is an iron bar in a world of water.

data.name: Angelic Chorus
data.oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
data.flavor_text: The very young and the very old know best the song the angels sing.

data.name: Angelic Page
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearers.

data.name: Brilliant Halo
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

data.name: Catastrophe
data.oracle_text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

data.name: Clear
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target enchantment.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Congregate
data.oracle_text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—*Song of All*, canto 642

data.name: Defensive Formation
data.oracle_text: Rather than the attacking player, you assign the combat damage of each creature attacking you. You can divide that creature's combat damage as you choose among any of the creatures blocking it.
data.flavor_text:
"Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."
—*Song of All*, canto 873

data.name: Disciple of Grace
data.oracle_text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Beauty is beyond law.

data.name: Disciple of Law
data.oracle_text:
Protection from red
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: A religious order for religious order.

data.name: Disenchant
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
data.flavor_text:
"Let Phyrexia breed evil in the darkness; my holy light will reveal its taint."
—Serra

data.name: Elite Archers
data.oracle_text: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text: Arrows fletched with the feathers of angels seldom miss their mark.

data.name: Faith Healer
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice an enchantment: You gain life equal to the sacrificed enchantment's mana value.
data.flavor_text: The power of faith is quiet. It is the leaf unmoved by the hurricane.

data.name: Glorious Anthem
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: Once heard, the battle song of an angel becomes part of the listener forever.

data.name: Healing Salve
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Xantcha is recovering. The medicine is slow, but my magic would have killed her."
—Serra, to Urza

data.name: Herald of Serra
data.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Echo {2}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

data.name: Humble
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.
data.flavor_text:
"It is not your place to rule, Radiant. It may not even be mine."
—Serra

data.name: Intrepid Hero
data.oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: "We each have our own strengths, Radiant," Serra said with a sly smile. "If all of my people were like this one, who would carry your scrolls?"

data.name: Monk Idealist
data.oracle_text: When Monk Idealist enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: "Belief is the strongest mortar."

data.name: Monk Realist
data.oracle_text: When Monk Realist enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
data.flavor_text: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

data.name: Opal Acrolith
data.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Acrolith is an enchantment, Opal Acrolith becomes a 2/4 Soldier creature.
{0}: Opal Acrolith becomes an enchantment.

data.name: Opal Archangel
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Archangel is an enchantment, Opal Archangel becomes a 5/5 Angel creature with flying and vigilance.

data.name: Opal Caryatid
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Caryatid is an enchantment, Opal Caryatid becomes a 2/2 Soldier creature.

data.name: Opal Gargoyle
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Gargoyle is an enchantment, Opal Gargoyle becomes a 2/2 Gargoyle creature with flying.

data.name: Opal Titan
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Titan is an enchantment, Opal Titan becomes a 4/4 Giant creature with protection from each of that spell's colors.

data.name: Pacifism
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
data.flavor_text:
"Fight? I cannot. I do not care if I live or die, so long as I can rest."
—Urza, to Serra

data.name: Pariah
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
data.flavor_text: "It is *not* sad," Radiant chided the lesser angel. "It is right. Every society must have its outcasts."

data.name: Path of Peace
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"When the sword becomes a burden, let the warrior lay it aside that another with a truer heart might take it up."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Pegasus Charger
data.oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
data.flavor_text:
"The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury."
—*Song of All*, canto 211

data.name: Planar Birth
data.oracle_text: Return all basic land cards from all graveyards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.
data.flavor_text:
"From womb of nothingness sprang this place of beauty, purity, and hope realized."
—*Song of All*, canto 3

data.name: Presence of the Master
data.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an enchantment spell, counter it.
data.flavor_text:
Peace to all. Peace be all.
—Great Hall floor inscription

data.name: Redeem
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"That they are saved from death is immaterial. What is important is that they know the source of their benefaction."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Remembrance
data.oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may search your library for a card with the same name as that creature, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

data.name: Rune of Protection: Artifacts
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: Black
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: Blue
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: Green
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: Lands
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a land source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: Red
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rune of Protection: White
data.oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Sanctum Custodian
data.oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
data.flavor_text: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

data.name: Sanctum Guardian
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.
data.flavor_text: "Protect our mother in her womb."

data.name: Seasoned Marshal
data.oracle_text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

data.name: Serra Avatar
data.oracle_text:
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

data.name: Serra Zealot
data.oracle_text: First strike
data.flavor_text:
"The humans are useful in their way, but they must be commanded as the builder commands the stone. Be soft with them, and they will become soft."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Serra's Embrace
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and vigilance.
data.flavor_text:
"Lifted beyond herself, for that battle Brindri was an angel of light and fury."
—*Song of All*, canto 524

data.name: Serra's Hymn
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Hymn.
Sacrifice Serra's Hymn: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Hymn.

data.name: Serra's Liturgy
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Serra's Liturgy.
{W}, Sacrifice Serra's Liturgy: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments, where X is the number of verse counters on Serra's Liturgy.

data.name: Shimmering Barrier
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Silent Attendant
data.oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

data.name: Songstitcher
data.oracle_text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

data.name: Soul Sculptor
data.oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player casts a creature spell.
data.flavor_text: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?

data.name: Voice of Grace
data.oracle_text: Flying, protection from black
data.flavor_text:
"Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."
—*Song of All*, canto 167

data.name: Voice of Law
data.oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
data.flavor_text:
"Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."
—*Song of All*, canto 167

data.name: Waylay
data.oracle_text: Create three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens. Exile them at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
data.flavor_text: "You reek of corruption," spat the knight. "Why are you even here?"

data.name: Worship
data.oracle_text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
—Serra

data.name: Academy Researchers
data.oracle_text: When Academy Researchers enters the battlefield, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to Academy Researchers.

data.name: Annul
data.oracle_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
data.flavor_text: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

data.name: Arcane Laboratory
data.oracle_text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
data.flavor_text: It soon became obvious that some experiments were best overseen by fireproof teachers.

data.name: Attunement
data.oracle_text: Return Attunement to its owner's hand: Draw three cards, then discard four cards.
data.flavor_text:
"The solution can hide for only so long."
—Urza

data.name: Back to Basics
data.oracle_text: Nonbasic lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
data.flavor_text:
"A ruler wears a crown while the rest of us wear hats, but which would you rather have when it's raining?"
—Barrin, *Principia*

data.name: Barrin, Master Wizard
data.oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Knowledge is no more expensive than ignorance, and at least as satisfying."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Catalog
data.oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Without order comes errors, and errors kill on Tolaria."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Cloak of Mists
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
data.flavor_text:
"All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Confiscate
data.oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
You control enchanted permanent.
data.flavor_text:
"I don't understand why he works so hard on a device to duplicate a sound so easily made with hand and armpit."
—Barrin, progress report

data.name: Coral Merfolk
data.flavor_text: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.

data.name: Curfew
data.oracle_text: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: ". . . But I'm not tired!"

data.name: Disruptive Student
data.oracle_text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
data.flavor_text:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report

data.name: Douse
data.oracle_text: {1}{U}: Counter target red spell.
data.flavor_text: The academy's libraries were protected by fire-prevention spells. Even after the disaster, the books were intact—though forever sealed in time.

data.name: Drifting Djinn
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drifting Djinn unless you pay {1}{U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Enchantment Alteration
data.oracle_text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

data.name: Energy Field
data.oracle_text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control.
When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

data.name: Exhaustion
data.oracle_text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.
data.flavor_text: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.

data.name: Fog Bank
data.oracle_text:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

data.name: Gilded Drake
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Gilded Drake enters the battlefield, exchange control of Gilded Drake and up to one target creature an opponent controls. If you don't or can't make an exchange, sacrifice Gilded Drake. This ability still resolves if its target becomes illegal.
data.flavor_text: Buyer beware.

data.name: Great Whale
data.oracle_text: When Great Whale enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands.
data.flavor_text:
"As a great whale dies, it flips onto its back. And so an island is born."
—Mariners' legend

data.name: Hermetic Study
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
data.flavor_text:
"Books can be replaced; a prize student cannot. Be patient."
—Urza, to Barrin

data.name: Hibernation
data.oracle_text: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text: On its way to the cave, the armadillo brushed by a sapling. It awoke to find a full-grown tree blocking its path.

data.name: Horseshoe Crab
data.oracle_text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
data.flavor_text: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

data.name: Imaginary Pet
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have a card in hand, return Imaginary Pet to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: "It followed me home. Can I keep it?"

data.name: Launch
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
When Launch is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Launch to its owner's hand.

data.name: Lilting Refrain
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Lilting Refrain.
Sacrifice Lilting Refrain: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of verse counters on Lilting Refrain.

data.name: Lingering Mirage
data.oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is an Island.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Birds frozen in flight. Sea turned to glass. Tolaria hidden in a mirror.

data.name: Morphling
data.oracle_text:
{U}: Untap Morphling.
{U}: Morphling gains flying until end of turn.
{U}: Morphling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Morphling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Morphling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

data.name: Pendrell Drake
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: The mages of Tolaria found strange ways to spend their free time. Occasionally they had contests to see whose kite was eaten last.

data.name: Pendrell Flux
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay its mana cost."
data.flavor_text: Devoured by the mists, Tolaria was stuck in time, trapped between two eternal heartbeats.

data.name: Peregrine Drake
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.
data.flavor_text: That the Tolarian mists parted for the drakes was warning enough to stay away.

data.name: Power Sink
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

data.name: Power Taint
data.oracle_text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Recantation
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Recantation.
{U}, Sacrifice Recantation: Return up to X target permanents to their owners' hands, where X is the number of verse counters on Recantation.

data.name: Rescind
data.oracle_text:
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Rewind
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
data.flavor_text:
"Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Sandbar Merfolk
data.oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: You are not prey until a predator knows of your existence.

data.name: Sandbar Serpent
data.oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Treacherous and unpredictable currents around Tolaria earned the nickname "serpent wakes."

data.name: Show and Tell
data.oracle_text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

data.name: Somnophore
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.

data.name: Spire Owl
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Spire Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

data.name: Stern Proctor
data.oracle_text: When Stern Proctor enters the battlefield, return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"I preferred the harsh tutors—they made mischief all the more fun."
—Teferi, third-level student

data.name: Stroke of Genius
data.oracle_text: Target player draws X cards.
data.flavor_text: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

data.name: Sunder
data.oracle_text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.

data.name: Telepathy
data.oracle_text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
data.flavor_text:
"The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are."
—Teferi, fourth-level student

data.name: Time Spiral
data.oracle_text: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

data.name: Tolarian Winds
data.oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
data.flavor_text: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

data.name: Turnabout
data.oracle_text: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.
data.flavor_text: The best cure for a big ego is a little failure.

data.name: Veil of Birds
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veil of Birds is an enchantment, Veil of Birds becomes a 1/1 Bird creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: When wind marries sky, even the bride's veil sings her praises.

data.name: Veiled Apparition
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Apparition is an enchantment, Veiled Apparition becomes a 3/3 Illusion creature with flying and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Veiled Apparition unless you pay {1}{U}."

data.name: Veiled Crocodile
data.oracle_text: When a player has no cards in hand, if Veiled Crocodile is an enchantment, Veiled Crocodile becomes a 4/4 Crocodile creature.
data.flavor_text: Some roads are paved with bad intentions.

data.name: Veiled Sentry
data.oracle_text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Sentry is an enchantment, Veiled Sentry becomes an Illusion creature with power and toughness each equal to that spell's mana value.

data.name: Veiled Serpent
data.oracle_text:
When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Serpent is an enchantment, Veiled Serpent becomes a 4/4 Serpent creature with "This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island."
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Windfall
data.oracle_text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
data.flavor_text:
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Wizard Mentor
data.oracle_text: {T}: Return Wizard Mentor and target creature you control to their owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Although some of the students quickly grasped the concept, the others could summon only blackboards.

data.name: Zephid
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
data.flavor_text: Once you've seen one, you'll understand why spells won't go near them.

data.name: Zephid's Embrace
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
data.flavor_text: Spells will shun you, as will everyone else.

data.name: Abyssal Horror
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
data.flavor_text: It has no face of its own—it wears that of its latest victim.

data.name: Befoul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Bereavement
data.oracle_text: Whenever a green creature dies, its controller discards a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Grief is as useless as love."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

data.name: Blood Vassal
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Blood Vassal: Add {B}{B}.
data.flavor_text:
"They are bred to suffer and born to die. Much like humans."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

data.name: Bog Raiders
data.oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
data.flavor_text:
"Let weak feed on weak, that we may divine the nature of strength."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

data.name: Bog Raiders
data.oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

data.name: Breach
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

data.name: Cackling Fiend
data.oracle_text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
data.flavor_text: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

data.name: Carrion Beetles
data.oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
data.flavor_text: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.

data.name: Contamination
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Contamination unless you sacrifice a creature.
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type and amount.

data.name: Corrupt
data.oracle_text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
data.flavor_text: Yawgmoth brushed Urza's mind, and Urza's world convulsed.

data.name: Crazed Skirge
data.oracle_text: Flying, haste
data.flavor_text: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

data.name: Dark Hatchling
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

data.name: Dark Ritual
data.oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
data.flavor_text:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus The Grand Evolution began."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

data.name: Darkest Hour
data.oracle_text: All creatures are black.
data.flavor_text:
"Yawgmoth spent eons wrapping Phyrexians in human skin. They are the sleeper agents, and they are everywhere."
—Xantcha, to Urza

data.name: Despondency
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.
When Despondency is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Despondency to its owner's hand.

data.name: Diabolic Servitude
data.oracle_text:
When Diabolic Servitude enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude dies, exile it and return Diabolic Servitude to its owner's hand.
When Diabolic Servitude leaves the battlefield, exile the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude.

data.name: Diabolic Servitude
data.oracle_text:
When Diabolic Servitude enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude dies, exile it and return Diabolic Servitude to its owner's hand.
When Diabolic Servitude leaves the battlefield, exile the creature put onto the battlefield with Diabolic Servitude.

data.name: Discordant Dirge
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Discordant Dirge.
{B}, Sacrifice Discordant Dirge: Look at target opponent's hand and choose up to X cards from it, where X is the number of verse counters on Discordant Dirge. That player discards those cards.

data.name: Duress
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
data.flavor_text:
"We decide who is worthy of our works."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

data.name: Eastern Paladin
data.oracle_text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Their fragile world. Their futile lives. They obstruct the Grand Evolution. In Yawgmoth's name, we shall excise them."
—Oath of the East

data.name: Exhume
data.oracle_text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
data.flavor_text:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest

data.name: Expunge
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Flesh Reaver
data.oracle_text: Whenever Flesh Reaver deals damage to a creature or opponent, Flesh Reaver deals that much damage to you.
data.flavor_text: Though the reaver is horrifyingly effective, its dorsal vents spit a highly corrosive cloud of filth.

data.name: Hollow Dogs
data.oracle_text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

data.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
data.oracle_text: Exile Ill-Gotten Gains. Each player discards their hand, then returns up to three cards from their graveyard to their hand.
data.flavor_text: Urza thought it a crusade. Xantcha knew it was a robbery.

data.name: Looming Shade
data.oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The shade tracks victims by reverberations of the pipes, as a spider senses prey tangled in its trembling web.

data.name: Looming Shade
data.oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

data.name: Lurking Evil
data.oracle_text: Pay half your life, rounded up: Lurking Evil becomes a 4/4 Phyrexian Horror creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Ash is our air, darkness our flesh."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

data.name: Mana Leech
data.oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap Mana Leech during your untap step.
{T}: Tap target land. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Mana Leech remains tapped.

data.name: No Rest for the Wicked
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice No Rest for the Wicked: Return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The soul? Here, we have no use for such frivolities."
—Sitrik, birth priest

data.name: No Rest for the Wicked
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice No Rest for the Wicked: Return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

data.name: Oppression
data.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Do not presume to speak for yourself."
—Gix, to Xantcha

data.name: Order of Yawgmoth
data.oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

data.name: Parasitic Bond
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Parasitic Bond deals 2 damage to that player.
data.flavor_text:
"All bonds are parasitic. Only rulership is pure."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

data.name: Persecute
data.oracle_text: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.
data.flavor_text:
"My finest warrior was lost to the Phyrexians. I pray that Lady Selenia died honorably."
—Radiant, archangel

data.name: Pestilence
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

data.name: Planar Void
data.oracle_text: Whenever another card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile that card.
data.flavor_text:
"Planeswalking isn't about walking. It's about falling and screaming."
—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

data.name: Priest of Gix
data.oracle_text: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add {B}{B}{B}.
data.flavor_text:
"Gix doesn't want a people to rule but puppets to entertain his madness."
—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

data.name: Rain of Filth
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "Sacrifice this land: Add {B}."
data.flavor_text:
"When I say it rained, it was not small drops, but a thick, greasy drool pouring from the heavens."
—Urza, journal

data.name: Ravenous Skirge
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Ravenous Skirge attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Hunger is a kind of madness—and here, all madness flourishes.

data.name: Reclusive Wight
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control another nonland permanent, sacrifice Reclusive Wight.
data.flavor_text: There are places so horrible that even the dead hide their faces.

data.name: Reprocess
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. Draw a card for each permanent sacrificed this way.
data.flavor_text: Everything will find its use in Phyrexia. Eventually.

data.name: Sanguine Guard
data.oracle_text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Sanguine Guard.
data.flavor_text:
"Father of Machines! Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

data.name: Sicken
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Urza dared to attack Phyrexia. Slowly, it retaliated.

data.name: Skirge Familiar
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Discard a card: Add {B}.
data.flavor_text: The first Yawgmoth priest to harness their power was rewarded with several unique mutilations.

data.name: Skittering Skirge
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
data.flavor_text: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

data.name: Sleeper Agent
data.oracle_text:
When Sleeper Agent enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Sleeper Agent deals 2 damage to you.

data.name: Spined Fluke
data.oracle_text:
When Spined Fluke enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
{B}: Regenerate Spined Fluke.
data.flavor_text: Its spines are prized as writing quills by the priests of Gix.

data.name: Tainted Aether
data.oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature or land.
data.flavor_text: Gix despised the sylvan morass. The gouge that the portal had torn in the forest was the only pleasing sight.

data.name: Unnerve
data.oracle_text: Each opponent discards two cards.
data.flavor_text:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

data.name: Unworthy Dead
data.oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Unworthy Dead.
data.flavor_text:
"Great Yawgmoth moves across the seas of shard and bone and rust. We exalt him in life, in death, and in between."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

data.name: Unworthy Dead
data.oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Unworthy Dead.

data.name: Vampiric Embrace
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by enchanted creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

data.name: Vebulid
data.oracle_text:
Vebulid enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Vebulid.
When Vebulid attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

data.name: Victimize
data.oracle_text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
data.flavor_text: The priest cast Xantcha to the ground. "It is defective. We must scrap it."

data.name: Vile Requiem
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on Vile Requiem.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice Vile Requiem: Destroy up to X target nonblack creatures, where X is the number of verse counters on Vile Requiem. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Western Paladin
data.oracle_text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Their weak laws. Their flawed systems. They inhibit the Grand Evolution. In Yawgmoth's name, we shall erase them."
—Oath of the West

data.name: Witch Engine
data.oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}. Target opponent gains control of Witch Engine. (Activate only as an instant.)

data.name: Yawgmoth's Edict
data.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Phyrexia's purity permits no other."
—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast
